title: Shadchan seeking setups
personal: I'm an amateur shadchan who wants to become a pro. Are you in search of love? Share the details with queerjews.com and let us help you!

title: I LOVE SHABBOS, YOU TOO?
personal: 31 y/o femme looking to fall in love ✨ with a shomer shabbos queer. Let's lie in the grass, go dancing, eat cake, stay up late talking and laughing and..I'm an artist, teacher, egal, communally living in NYC, tryna make the revolution irresistible. Hoping for squishy babies in the future.

title: SEEKING A LOVER AND MUSE
personal: to uncover earthly secrets we can only find together. Break my heart, or I’ll break yours. I’ll write you a song if you send me a poem. Married, poly, open to sex but it’s really not the point. Open to light torture, emotional or otherwise. Viet, transmasc, egal, 32 in NYC.
